MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW8 postcode areas of Northwich, affecting properties in Weaverham, Cuddington, Acton Bridge and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  1.00PM. Our engineers have arrived in the local area and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the overhead line network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Due to further network investigations needed and the use of fault finding equipment we now expect the power to be restored by 5.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.24PM on 15th October 2020.
